resources.string:
General:

Creating a packing list requires a package that is stored in a category.

It is therefore important to have a category in which there is a piece of luggage in order to be able to create a packing list.

The following sequence must therefore be observed:

  • Create category
  • Store packages in category
  • Create a packing list with packages from the respective categories

Sync:
(currently only the database is copied from the calling device to the connected device)

In order to synchronize the databases, both devices must be in this overview. In addition, both devices must be connected.

Pressing "Send" replaces the database of the connected device with that of the current device.

The "Synchronize" option will be activated later, so that the databases of the two devices will be brought together.

Categories:

A category represents a division in which luggage is categorized.

With the plus at the bottom right a new category can be created.

A simple press on the entry of a category will display the details.

A long press on the entry of a category leads to editing the category.

Pressing the trash can behind a category will delete that category. This is not possible as long as there are luggage in the category.

Luggage:

A new piece of luggage can be created with the plus at the bottom right.
To do this, you must first select a category that has already been created, then enter a name for the new piece of luggage and, finally, save the weight of the piece of luggage.             This entry is saved with "Save".

A simple press on a column name sorts the luggage.

A simple press on the entry of a piece of luggage shows the details.

A long press on the entry of a piece of luggage leads to the processing of the piece of luggage.

A swipe over an entry to the right deactivates an entry. This entry is then no longer available for creating a packing list.

A swipe left over an entry reactivates a deactivated entry.

Pressing the trash can behind a piece of luggage deletes that piece of luggage. This is not possible as long as the baggage is still in a packing list.

Packing Lists:

To create a packing list, a package is required, which is stored in a category.

It is therefore important to have a category in which there is a piece of luggage in order to be able to create a packing list.

The following sequence must therefore be observed:

  • Create category
  • Store packages in category
  • Create packing list with packages from the respective categories

Packing list detailed view:

All items of luggage stored in a packing list are displayed in this overview.

Clicking on the respective category shows or hides it.

With the plus at the bottom right, an already created piece of luggage can be added to the current packing list.
A category is selected from the dropdown.
It is then possible to select a piece of luggage from the category.
Finally, enter the desired number of this piece of luggage for the current packing list and confirm with "Save".

A simple press on an entry in the luggage list shows the details of the stored luggage.

A long press on an entry in the baggage list leads to the editing of the entry. The procedure here is analogous to "Create new".

Pressing the trash can behind an entry removes this item from the current packing list. However, it remains in the database.
